cab.content: This Document Is tsi Property of * tJ M His Britannia Majasiys Government.Military Secret.--hffW-- MR. G. LOMGHURST.From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, mil December 1910.ALL 6(Repeated to Tehran under No. 5622/42.) (Received 27th.) - 17151. Malleson telegraphs,'dated 20th December : " Merv, ,12th December. Evening of 11th December about 300 troops fromAskabad passed east. Said to be going to Kerki and Termez. An aeroplane has arrived Merv and is still in packing cases on platform. Said to be going to Kushk.Bolsheviks in Merv claim that their troops are close to Krasnovodsk and will sooncross to Baku."
